item1:
库存数据的查询
Inquiry of inventory data
item2:
可查询产品在哪个库位及产品明细数据
You can check the location and the details of the article
item4:
货物已入库
Article have been stored
item5:
库存信息的查询条件
Search conditions for inventory information
输出
item6:
库存数据
Inventory data
异常处里
item7:
如果无符合条件的库存数据，系统将提示查无此库存信息
If there is no eligible inventory data, the system will prompt that there is no such inventory information
如果因为网路中断产生的异常，须结束WES软件，请网路管理人员恢复网路后再重启WES
If the WES software needs to be terminated due to an abnormality caused by a network interruption, ask the network administrator to restore the network and restart WES
操作步骤
item8:
1. 输入查询条件或挑选article No后点选Query查询库存数据
Enter query conditions or select article No and click Query to query inventory data
2. 点选功能菜单Refresh可清除画面上的数据回到初始状态
Click refresh to clear the data on the screen and return to the initial state
3. 点选功能菜单Exit或关闭视窗可结束此作业
Click the function menu exit or close window to end this job
后置条件
